actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To extend temporarily the treatment of Monroe County, Pennsylvania, as a HUBZone, and for other purposes.
short_title: Monroe County HUBZone Extension Act of 2011

summary.text: Monroe County HUBZone Act of 2011 - Provides that, for purposes of the Small Business Act, Monroe County, Pennsylvania, shall be a HUBZone (historically underutilized business zone) during the three-year period beginning on October 1, 2011.

titles.title: Monroe County HUBZone Extension Act of 2011
To extend temporarily the treatment of Monroe County, Pennsylvania, as a HUBZone, and for other purposes.
